bibl.title: Report on the 36th Season of Excavation and Restoration on the Island of Elephantine. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: 36th season of the German Institute of Archaeology and the Swiss Institute for Architectural and Archaeological Research on Ancient Egypt at Elephantine, October 22nd 2006 - April 8th 2007. - See in part. pp. 365-366: 3. Temple of Khnum: Temple and Later Structures (F. Arnold); - 366-371: 4. Graeco-Roman Epigraphy: Temple of Khnum [i.e. decoration in high relief, etc.; no Greek or Latin inscription] (E. Laskowska-Kusztal); - 378-379: 7. Textiles of the First Millennium AD (R. Cortopassi); - 379-383: 8. Late Roman Pottery from the Khnum Temple Precinct on Elephantine Island (M. Weber).
bibl.seg: Raue Dietrich et alii, Report on the 36th Season of Excavation and Restoration on the Island of Elephantine. Avec résumé en anglais.

36th season of the German Institute of Archaeology and the Swiss Institute for Architectural and Archaeological Research on Ancient Egypt at Elephantine, October 22nd 2006 - April 8th 2007. - See in part. pp. 365-366: 3. Temple of Khnum: Temple and Later Structures (F. Arnold); - 366-371: 4. Graeco-Roman Epigraphy: Temple of Khnum [i.e. decoration in high relief, etc.; no Greek or Latin inscription] (E. Laskowska-Kusztal); - 378-379: 7. Textiles of the First Millennium AD (R. Cortopassi); - 379-383: 8. Late Roman Pottery from the Khnum Temple Precinct on Elephantine Island (M. Weber).
